rules_text:
Foreshadow {5}{W} [i](You may cast this spell for its foreshadow cost. If you do, also trigger its “dies” ability when it enters.)[/i]
When Loyal Retriever dies, search your library for an Aura or Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: [i]Whether it was fetching a crossbow for her master or snatching a leg from a ghoul, Mandy was a valued presence in the Elgaud Grounds.[/i]
